kreport.name: gzForecloseRate2

data.tbody: ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7}%

kreport.ksql: --深圳预处理率 select executergrouporgname 部门, total 首派单数, zp 转派单数, zyz 经业支数, zh 直接回单数, total-zp-zh 在途单数, decode(zh,0,0,round(1/(1+zp/zh)*100,2)) 预处理率 from( select fi.executergrouporgname, count(*) total, nvl(sum(decode(fi.executergrouporgid,co.executergrouporgid,0,1)),0) zp, nvl(sum(decode(instr(co.executergrouporgid,'8a92635521a51e8f0121a523f8a00ed1'),0,0,1)),0) zyz, nvl(sum(decode(fi.executergrouporgid,co.executergrouporgid,decode(co.isc,1,1,0),0)),0) zh from ( select f.flowlsh,n.executergrouporgid,n.executergrouporgname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY n.flowlsh ORDER BY n.gendate) rn from rec_flow f,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688', --省IT中心科室处理 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' --厂家处理 ) #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] ) fi, ( select f.flowlsh, strcat(distinct n.executergrouporgid) executergrouporgid, decode(i.fualtstatus,'230',1,'240',1,'250',1,0) isc from rec_flow f,rec_node n,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688', --省IT中心科室处理 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' --厂家处理 ) #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] group by f.flowlsh,decode(i.fualtstatus,'230',1,'240',1,'250',1,0) ) co where fi.flowlsh=co.flowlsh and fi.rn=1 and fi.executergrouporgid in ('8a92635521a51e8f0121a523f8a00ed1','8a92635521a51e8f0121a5211f3e02c2') group by fi.executergrouporgid,fi.executergrouporgname )
